Description: Creating a brand new rapper into the French rap scene
Technical details: Using python for scraping the API of genius.com
Photo by Søren Astrup Jørgensen on Unsplash

Description: Durening the 2019 edition of the Scaleday, celebrating Scaleway's 20-year anniversary, I had the opportunity to present my work. I designed and built a machine learning pipeline to prevent credit card fraud on Scaleway
Technical details: The presentation is hosted on Scaleway's slideshare account.

title: Artificial Intelligence Meetup
subtitle: Open-Source Tools for Machine Learning on Kubernetes

Description: Kubernetes has become the go-to tool to deploy, scale & manage distributed apps.
As Machine Learning find its way into more apps, it’s imperative to take advantage of Kubernetes infrastructure to develop more distributed and scalable models.
In this talk, we will show you some open source frameworks that you can use to create a full Machine Learning pipeline, from training to inference.
Technical details: See the Meetup description on the Meetup website.
